description:
Any trail, any terrain, any day. Lightweight enough for easy kilometres but rugged enough for rocks and roots, the Targhee carries you from trailhead to viewpoint with ease. A waterproof-breathable membrane keeps feet dry and comfortable through puddles and surprise rainshowers, while a cushy midsole adds a little spring to every step. A grippy sole keeps you upright on slippery sections, while an antimicrobial treatment keeps the closet smelling fresh between hikes.

  • Leather and synthetic mesh upper for water-shedding durability
  • Mid-height offers more protection and stability
  • Waterproof-breathable membrane provides weather protection
  • Cleansport NXT™ antimicrobial treatment resists foot funk
  • Removable EVA footbed provides support and comfort
  • ESS shank provides torsional stability
  • EVA midsole for a cushioned ride
  • All-terrain, non-marking rubber outsole provides reliable traction and grip
name: Keen Targhee Mid Waterproof Shoes - Children to Youths
